org.gvsig.raster.impl.provider

Class MemoryTileMatrixBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gvsig.raster.impl.provider.MemoryTileMatrixBuffer

  • public class MemoryTileMatrixBuffer
extends java.lang.Object
    Buffer composed by a list of tiles and its extents. It will expose a method getWindow to read a window of data from the tile list. The list of tiles have to make a square.
